Ebbro 43038 Nissan Skyline 2000 GT-R (PGC10) 1970 JAF Grand Prix Clubman Race Winner M. Kurosawa

The first Skyline GT-R (PGC10) was released on February 4, 1969 and scored 33 victories in the 1-1/2 years it raced. This is Motoharu Kurosawa's winning car from the 1970 JAF Grand Prix Clubman Race. This was his second win as a factory driver for Nissan. After his retirement from racing, he became a motor journalist and was one of the regular presenters of the Best Motoring automotive video journal series in Japan.

Check out this video of "Gan-san" driving this car around Fuji: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qy9Gsni54D8
